actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that certain community associations shall be entitled to special third-class mailing rates.

summary.text: Entitles community black associations to reduced postal rates as non-profit organizations.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that certain community associations shall be entitled to special third-class mailing rates.
